book.synopsis: The distinguished historian continues his wide-ranging, comprehensive history of Britain in a third and final volume that takes Great Britain from the American Revolution to the present day, detailing its role as a global power, its role during two world wars, and other key events and personalities that shaped more than two centuries of history. 50,000 first printing.
book.title_long: History of Britain, A - Volume III: The Fate of the Empire 1776 - 2000
book.dimensions: Height: 9.75 Inches, Length: 7.5 Inches, Weight: 4.23 Pounds, Width: 0 Inches
